hero.title: Our Members
hero.text: We are a community of people who are passionate about life and the world around us. We are a diverse group of people from all walks of life, and we are united to gaming and various events.

core.title: Core Members
core.description: The members whom soul and heart connected to the community.

official.title: Official Members
official.description: The members whom actively participate in the community.

verified.title: Verified Members
verified.description: The members whom are known to the community.

source_disclaimer: The above list is according to our Discord server member list.
opt_out_guide: If you wish to opt-out from this list, please contact us via Discord.
hierarchy_disclaimer: Order do not represent any hierarchy. All members are equal.
